languages.text:
Архетип отражает путь развития персонажа. То, кем он был, и то, кем станет.
Каждый архетип определяет ключевые умения персонажа: какие способности он будет использовать в бою, какие навыки помогут разрешать трудности во время странствий, или как улучшатся его спецспособности.
Архетип разбит на ранги, каждый из которых позволяет выбрать новую способность или талант, улучшить их, или же повысить значение навыка или характеристики.
languages.original_text:
The archetype reflects the evolution of the character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills will help them more effectively resolve difficulties during their travels, or how their special abilities will improve.
The archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

traits.locale_text:
Архетип отражает путь развития персонажа. То, кем он был, и то, кем станет.
Каждый архетип определяет ключевые умения персонажа: какие способности он будет использовать в бою, какие навыки помогут разрешать трудности во время странствий, или как улучшатся его спецспособности.
Архетип разбит на ранги, каждый из которых позволяет выбрать новую способность или талант, улучшить их, или же повысить значение навыка или характеристики.

languages.text:
An archetype reflects the evolution of a character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

traits.locale_text:
An archetype reflects the evolution of a character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

An archetype reflects the evolution of a character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

languages.text:
职业代表角色的发展路线，代表角色过去与未来的行事与战斗风格。
职业决定了角色的关键特性，决定角色会在战斗中使用何种能力，会依靠何种技能来解决旅途过程中的困难，或是如何强化某些特殊能力。
职业有等级之分。每升一级，玩家便可以选择一种新的能力或天赋、强化相关能力或天赋，或提高技能与属性值。
languages.original_text:
An archetype reflects the evolution of a character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

traits.locale_text:
职业代表角色的发展路线，代表角色过去与未来的行事与战斗风格。
职业决定了角色的关键特性，决定角色会在战斗中使用何种能力，会依靠何种技能来解决旅途过程中的困难，或是如何强化某些特殊能力。
职业有等级之分。每升一级，玩家便可以选择一种新的能力或天赋、强化相关能力或天赋，或提高技能与属性值。

languages.text: Ein Archetyp spiegelt die Entwicklung eines Charakters wider. Was er war und was er werden wird. Jeder Archetyp legt die Hauptmerkmale des Charakters fest: welche Fähigkeiten er im Kampf einsetzt, mithilfe welcher Fertigkeiten er Schwierigkeiten auf seinem Weg meistert oder wie bestimmte Spezialfähigkeiten verbessert werden können. Ein Archetyp ist in Ränge eingeteilt und mit jedem Rang kannst du eine neue Fähigkeit oder ein neues Talent wählen, sie verbessern oder den Wert einer Fertigkeit oder Eigenschaft erhöhen.
languages.original_text:
An archetype reflects the evolution of a character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

traits.locale_text:
Eine Doktrin spiegelt die Entwicklung eines Charakters wider. Was er war und was er werden wird.
Jede Doktrin legt die Hauptmerkmale des Charakters fest: welche Fähigkeiten er im Kampf einsetzt, mithilfe welcher Fertigkeiten er Schwierigkeiten auf seinem Weg meistert oder wie bestimmte Spezialfähigkeiten verbessert werden können.
Eine Doktrin ist in Ränge eingeteilt und mit jedem Rang kannst du eine neue Fähigkeit oder ein neues Talent wählen, sie verbessern oder den Wert einer Fertigkeit oder Eigenschaft erhöhen.

languages.text:
L'archétype reflète l'évolution d'un personnage, son passé et son futur.
Chaque archétype détermine les caractéristiques principales du personnage : les capacités qu'il peut utiliser en combat, les compétences dont il dispose pour surmonter des difficultés lors de ses expéditions, ainsi que la manière dont certaines capacités spéciales peuvent être améliorées.
Les archétypes évoluent grâce à un système de rangs, chacun d'entre eux permettant d'adopter une capacité ou un talent supplémentaire, ou encore d'améliorer la valeur d'une compétence ou d'une caractéristique.
languages.original_text:
An archetype reflects the evolution of a character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

traits.locale_text:
La doctrine reflète l’évolution d’un personnage, son passé et son futur.
Chaque doctrine détermine les caractéristiques principales du personnage : les capacités qu’il peut utiliser en combat, les compétences dont il dispose pour surmonter des difficultés lors de ses expéditions, ainsi que la manière dont certaines capacités spéciales peuvent être améliorées.
Une doctrine évolue grâce à un système de rangs, chacun d’entre eux permet d’adopter une capacité ou un talent supplémentaire, ou encore d’améliorer la valeur d’une compétence ou d’une caractéristique.

languages.text:
Un arquetipo refleja la evolución de un personaje, lo que era y lo que será.
Cada arquetipo determina los aspectos clave del personaje: qué capacidades usa en combate, de qué habilidades depende al resolver dificultades en sus viajes y cómo mejoran ciertas capacidades especiales.
Cada arquetipo está dividido en varios rangos, cada uno de los cuales permite elegir una capacidad o un talento, mejorarlos o aumentar el valor de una habilidad o característica.
languages.original_text:
An archetype reflects the evolution of a character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.

traits.locale_text:
Un arquetipo refleja la evolución de un personaje, lo que era y lo que será.
Cada arquetipo determina los aspectos clave del personaje: qué capacidades usa en combate, de qué habilidades depende al resolver dificultades en sus viajes y cómo mejoran ciertas capacidades especiales.
Cada arquetipo está dividido en varios rangos, cada uno de los cuales permite elegir una capacidad o un talento, mejorarlos o aumentar el valor de una habilidad o característica.

languages.text:
タイプはキャラクターの進化を反映する。キャラクターのこれまでの姿、そしてこれからを。
それぞれのタイプは、キャラクターの主な特徴を定める：戦闘でどのような能力を使うか、旅先での問題解決にどのような技能を使うか、特定の特殊能力をどのように向上させるか、など。
タイプはランクに分けされていて、それぞれのランクで新しい能力や才能を選んだり、向上させたり、スキルや特性の価値を高めたりすることが可能。
languages.original_text:
An archetype reflects the evolution of a character. What they were and what they will become.
Each archetype determines the character's key features: what abilities they will use in battle, what skills they will rely on to resolve difficulties during their travels, or how certain special abilities can be improved.
An archetype is divided into ranks, each of which allows to choose a new ability or talent, improve it, or increase the value of a skill or characteristic.
